long_desc.thetext:
By now three widget have a static ROOT variable:
Blocker Image Dialog
We introduced this, because these widgets have a reference to application root. But in playground case, the application root is not the mobile root, it is the playground root.
If you reference a method inside the mobile root, and try to access it via
qx.core.Init.getApplication().getRoot()
you get an error in playground because you get the desktop root.
That is why, we added the workaround for these widget, to have a static root, which is overwritten on Playground startup, and provides the correct reference to the mobile root.
We should find a way to access the mobile root in Playground context without this workaround.
